bibl.title: Four "Fayoum Portraits" in the Getty Museum.
bibl.note: 1. Inv. 71.AI.72. Portrait of Man. Hawara, A.D. 100-125. - 2. Inv. 73.AI.91. Portrait of Flavian Matron. Hawara, ca. A.D. 100. - 3. Inv. 73.AI. 94. Portrait of a bearded Man. Probably Er-Rubayat, A.D. 150-175. - 4. Inv. 73.AI.11. Idem. Er-Rubayat, A.D. 175-225.
bibl.seg: Thompson David L., Four "Fayoum Portraits" in the Getty Museum.

1. Inv. 71.AI.72. Portrait of Man. Hawara, A.D. 100-125. - 2. Inv. 73.AI.91. Portrait of Flavian Matron. Hawara, ca. A.D. 100. - 3. Inv. 73.AI. 94. Portrait of a bearded Man. Probably Er-Rubayat, A.D. 150-175. - 4. Inv. 73.AI.11. Idem. Er-Rubayat, A.D. 175-225.
